Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th Street/Western
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, California, 51st, Western, and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th Street/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, California, 51st, Western, and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th Street/Western.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
